## Init

```{r load-packages, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyr)
library(dplyr)
library(readr)
library(janitor)

vac_data <- read_csv("vac_data.csv") %>%
  clean_names()
state_data <- read_csv("state_data.csv") %>%
  clean_names()
case_data <- read_csv("case_data.csv") %>%
  clean_names()
```

## 1) Looking at Ladakh

```{r}
df1 <- vac_data %>%
  select(updated_on, state, total_doses_administered)

# omit null rows
cols <- ncol(state_data)
is_na <- is.na(state_data)
row_na <- rowSums(is_na)
df2 <- state_data[row_na != cols, ] %>% 
  #select(!(estimated_per_capita_income_in_india_fy_2019_rs)) %>%
  rename(state = state_name)

df3 <- merge(x = df1, y = df2, by = "state", all.x = TRUE)
df5 <- merge(x = df3, y = case_data, by = "state")

df4 <- df3 %>%
  filter(state == "Dadra and Nagar Haveli and Daman and Diu")
```
